title: How to Find Your Facebook Page ID

steps.title: Open Facebook.
steps.content: Open Facebook . It’s the blue icon with a white “F” on your home screen (iPhone/iPad) or in the app drawer (Android).

steps.title: Sign in to Facebook.
steps.content: Sign in to Facebook. If you’re not already signed in, enter your username and password into the blanks and tap Log In .

steps.title: Go to your Page.
steps.content: Go to your Page. To find it, tap the Search box at the top of the screen, then type its name. Tap the correct Page when it appears in the search results.

steps.title: Tap About.
steps.content: Tap About . You may have to scroll down a little to find it.

steps.title: Scroll down to “Page ID.”
steps.content: Scroll down to “Page ID.” The unique ID number for your Page appears here.

steps.title: Go to https://www.facebook.com in a web browser.
steps.content: Go to https://www.facebook.com in a web browser.

steps.title: Sign in to Facebook.
steps.content: Sign in to Facebook. If you’re not yet signed in, enter your Facebook username and password into the blanks at the top right corner of the screen, then click Log In .

steps.title: Click the downward-facing arrow.
steps.content: Click the downward-facing arrow. It’s the small white arrow the top right corner of Facebook.

steps.title: Select your Page.
steps.content: Select your Page. All Pages you manage are listed beneath “Your Pages.”

steps.title: Click About.
steps.content: Click About . It’s in the list of options on the left side of the screen.

steps.title: Scroll down to “Page ID.”
steps.content: Scroll down to “Page ID.” The unique ID number for your Page appears here.
